Im kinda new to downloading torrents of games. Could someone please explain to me how to do this properly?

"Could someone please explain to me how to do this properly?"

The only thing you have to do is unpack the files using winrar and then burn the .ISO file SLOWLY (X2) with for example igmburn.

If you don´t know how to unpack the files. Just download Winar and rightclick the first file in the folder (ws2gmsp.r00) and choose "extract here"..

But that is of course if you have a chipped Wii. If you use USB-loader or some other way to play the games I unfortunately do´nt know how you should do to play the game... I have a chipped console myself I does´nt have a clue how to get the game to work on other consoles.. :P
But just do as I explained above to get the ISO-file. As for getting the programs needed for extracting/burning Google is your friend. :)

@chrisjahn123: I found that Verbatim disks work much better than cheaper brands. Burn at 1x or 2x speeds for more reliable results.

Works with UK PAL Wii's drivekey v4 and Wasabi DX, Windows 7, IMG Burn v2.5.1.0 (http://www.imgburn.com/) It is free!, Verbatim burned at x4 (lowest recomended speed), Optiarc dvd-rw ad-7200s ata.
